title: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project Properties Info page should not use text fields
description: Bug 23787[Properties dialog] Project PropertiesInfo page should not use text fields Integration build 09/17.Looks bad on all motif platforms.
OB: On the Project Properties Info page, the fields for Path, Type, and other attributes are displayed as text fields.
EB: The Project Properties Info page should not use text fields to display the attributes. Instead, it should use read-only fields or labels.
SR: To reproduce, select a Project, right-click, select Properties, and navigate to the Info page. Notice that the fields for Path, Type, and other attributes are editable text fields instead of read-only fields.
